name: Randomdirection
0:
”Alexa, ask Random direction for 5 kilometers.”
”Alexa, ask Random direction for 8 miles.”
”Alexa, ask Random direction for 600 meters.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: random direction
des:
If you need some suggestions for where to go after lock down.
Or if you're bored and want to discover new places.

Alexa also has a built in random direction service but it will give you a "sample" direction, the result can be left, right, north, east, etc. This skill will give you either North, east, etc. compass directions or a number in degrees.

Other examples...
Alexa, ask random direction for compass. (For N, S, E, W)
Alexa, ask random direction for degrees.
Alexa, open random direction and reset.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
